data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: As a nation we are immensely disturbed by the recent rise of amateur terrorist attacks. We ____ condemn ____ tragedy ____ Manchester, and ____ our ____ to ____ citizens ____. We ____ to ____ assistance ____ every ____ way. We shall not allow any further torment.
data.partBlankContent: As a nation we are immensely disturbed by the recent rise of amateur terrorist attacks. We wholehe_______ condemn t__ tragedy i_ Manchester, and of___ our symp____ to t__ citizens invo____. We v__ to gi__ assistance i_ every conce______ way. We shall not allow any further torment.
data.answer: 作为一个国家，我们对最近兴起的业余恐怖袭击深感不安。我们衷心谴责发生在曼彻斯特的悲剧，并向相关公民表示同情。我们争相以一切可能的方式提供援助。我们不能再受任何折磨了。
